            $(function(){
                var bloxServiceIDs = [];
                var bloxUserServiceIds = [];
                var dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];

                
                bloxServiceIDs.push();
                

                if (__tnt.user.services){
                    var bloxUserServiceIDs = __tnt.user.services.replace('%2C',',').split(',');
                }

                // GTM tncms.subscription.paid_access_service_ids
                if(bloxServiceIDs){
                    dataLayer.push({'tncms':{'subscription':{'access_service_ids':bloxServiceIDs.toString()}}});
                }

                // GTM tncms.subscrption.user_service_ids
                if(bloxUserServiceIDs){
                    dataLayer.push({'tncms':{'subscription':{'user_service_ids':bloxUserServiceIDs.toString()}}});
                }
            });

<script>
    $('#site-search-615297-btn').on(__tnt.client.clickEvent, function(){
        $('#site-search-615297').submit();
        return false;
    });

    $('#site-search-615297').on('submit', function(){
        // Filter query
        var sQueryFiltered = $("#site-search-615297 input[name=q]").val().replace(/\?/g, '');
    $("#site-search-615297 input[name=q]").val( sQueryFiltered );

        if( $('#site-search-615297-term').val() ){
            return true;
        }else{
            return false;
        }

                <script>
                    jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                        var sNavContainer = '#site-navbar-container';
                        var sBodyContainer = '#main-body-container';
                        var sNavHeight = $(sNavContainer).height();
                        var iUnfixPoint = 0;
                        if( __tnt.client.platform.ios ){
                            $(sNavContainer).addClass('affix-sticky');
                        } else {
                            $sNavScroll = false;
                            $(window).on('scroll mousewheel', function(){
                                if( !$sNavScroll ){
                                    $sNavScroll = true;
                                    setTimeout(function(){
                                        var iFixPoint = $(sNavContainer).offset().top;
                                        var iCurrPoint = $(this).scrollTop();
                                        if( iCurrPoint >= iFixPoint && iCurrPoint > iUnfixPoint ){
                                            if( !$(sNavContainer).hasClass('affix') ){ 
                                                iUnfixPoint = iFixPoint;
                                                $(sNavContainer).addClass('affix').removeClass('affix-top');
                                                $(sBodyContainer).css('margin-top', sNavHeight+'px'); 
                                            }
                                        } else {
                                            if( !$(sNavContainer).hasClass('affix-top') ){ 
                                                $(sNavContainer).removeClass('affix').addClass('affix-top');
                                                $(sBodyContainer).css('margin-top', 0);
                                            }
                                        }
                                        $sNavScroll = false;
                                    }, 25);
                                }
                            });
                        }
                    });
                </script>

                        <form id="followed-notification-modal-form" class="follow-notify-form" action="/search/savedsearch/save/?f=html&amp;q=labour&amp;d1=2018-01-01&amp;d2=2019-01-01&amp;sd=desc&amp;l=100&amp;t=article&amp;nsa=eedition" method="post">

                        <script>
                            jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                                $('#followed-notification-modal-form').submit(function(e) {
                                    e.preventDefault();
                                    var $followBtn = $(this).find('.follow-btn');
                                    var sAction = $(this).attr('action') + '&title=' + $(this).find('.input-notification-name').val();
                                    $followBtn.find('.tnt-svg').show();
                                    $followBtn.prop('disabled', true);

                                    function submit_finished($alert){
                                        setTimeout(function(){
                                            $followBtn.find('.tnt-svg').hide();
                                            $alert.show().delay(2500).fadeOut(400);
                                        },2000);
                                    }

                                    $.ajax({
                                        type: 'POST',
                                        url: sAction,
                                        data: $(this).serialize(),
                                        success: function(oData){
                                            
                                            submit_finished( $('#followed-notification-modal-user .alert-success') );
                                        },
                                        error: function(oData){
                                            submit_finished( $('#followed-notification-modal-user .alert-danger') );
                                        }
                                    });
                                });
                            });
                        </script>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

    <script>
        $(function(){
            /* handle automatic form expand */
            $('#search-form-text').focus(function(){
                $('#search-form-collapse').collapse('show');
                $('#search-form-collapse-toggle').toggleClass('collapsed');
            });

            $('#search-form-collapse').on('show.bs.collapse', function(){
                $('#search-form-collapse-toggle .advanced-text').addClass('hide');
                $('#search-form-collapse-toggle .close-text').removeClass('hide');
            });

            $('#search-form-collapse').on('hide.bs.collapse', function(){
                $('#search-form-collapse-toggle .advanced-text').removeClass('hide');
                $('#search-form-collapse-toggle .close-text').addClass('hide');
            });

            $('#input-type-all').change(function(){
                if(this.checked){
                    $('#input-type-articles,#input-type-collections,#input-type-videos,#input-type-images,#input-type-documents').prop('checked',false);
                }
            });
            $('#input-type-articles,#input-type-collections,#input-type-videos,#input-type-images,#input-type-documents').change(function(){
                if( $('#input-type-all')[0].checked ){
                    $('#input-type-all').prop('checked',false);
                }
            });
            $('.input-section-all').change(function(){
                if(this.checked){
                    $('.input-section').prop('checked',false);
                }
            });
            $('.input-section').change(function(){
                if( $('.input-section-all')[0].checked ){
                    $('.input-section-all').prop('checked',false);
                }
            });

            $('#input-d1, #input-d2').datepicker({
                startDate: '-100y',
                format: 'yyyy-mm-dd',
                todayHighlight: true,
                autoclose: 'true'
            }).on('show hide', function(e){
                e.stopPropagation();
            });

            $('#search-form').find('.search-submit').on(__tnt.client.clickEvent, function(){
                $('#search-form').submit();
            });
            

            $('#search-form').on('submit', function(){
                // Filter query
                var sQueryFiltered = $("#search-form input[name=q]").val().replace(/\?/g, '');
    $("#search-form input[name=q]").val( sQueryFiltered );
                
                // Define type and section values
                var sTypeVals = $.map($('.input-type:checked'), function(n, i){
                    return n.value;
                }).join(',');
                var sTypeValsSection = $.map($('.input-section:checked'), function(n, i){
                    return n.value;
                }).join(',');
                $('#input-t').val(sTypeVals);
                $('#input-c').val(sTypeValsSection);
                // Scrub empty inputs
                $(this).find(':input').each(function(){
                    if ($(this).val() == '') $(this).attr("disabled", "disabled");
                });
                // Sort by relevance patch
                $(this).find('#select-s option:selected')
                    .filter(function() {
                        return !this.value || $.trim(this.value).length == 0;
                    })
                    .parent()
                    .attr("disabled", "disabled");
                $('#search-form').find('.search-submit').find('[data-fa-i2svg]').replaceWith('<i class="fas tnt-spinner tnt-spin"></i>');
            });
        });
    </script>

            <ul class="list-inline">

                            <div class="card-lead">

            <ul class="list-inline">
                        <li class="card-byline text-muted"><span id="author-f32a65bc-1a34-11e8-a290-67706412e205-asset-cf62c200-cb5f-11e8-bc2a-c3ff1e63cd5d" class="tnt-byline asset-byline"  >Michelle Loubon</span>
                </li><li class="card-date">
        <time datetime="2018-10-08T21:30:00-04:00" class="tnt-date asset-date text-muted">Oct 8, 2018</time></li><li class="card-comment-count"></li></ul>
        </div>
                    
                    
                    
                    
                        
                        
                            <div class="card-lead">
                                <p class="tnt-summary">“Pure justice. What was delivered was pure justice.” </p>
                            </div>
                        
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>

             <a href="/opinion/columnists/the-price-of-success/article_37099bda-2724-11e8-944c-135491909a13.html" class="tnt-asset-link">
        

        
            The price of success</a></h3></div><div class="card-meta">
            <ul class="list-inline">
                        <li class="card-byline text-muted"><span id="author-84588bb8-1f62-11e8-9c7d-3bed2797a35d-asset-37099bda-2724-11e8-944c-135491909a13" class="tnt-byline asset-byline"  >Andy Johnson</span>
                </li><li class="card-date">
        <time datetime="2018-03-13T21:08:00-04:00" class="tnt-date asset-date text-muted">Mar 13, 2018</time></li><li class="card-comment-count"></li></ul>

                <div id="tncms-region-footer-top-col-full" class="tncms-region "><div id="tncms-block-726251" class="tncms-block"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
<style>
html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}
body {

}

#myBtn {
  display: none;
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 20px;
  right: 30px;
  z-index: 99;
  font-size: 18px;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  background-color: red;
  color: white;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 15px;
  border-radius: 4px;
}

#myBtn:hover {
  background-color: #555;
}
</style>
<button onclick="topFunction()" id="myBtn" title="Go to top">Top</button><script>
// When the user scrolls down 20px from the top of the document, show the button
window.onscroll = function() {scrollFunction()};

function scrollFunction() {
  if (document.body.scrollTop > 20 || document.documentElement.scrollTop > 20) {
    document.getElementById("myBtn").style.display = "block";
  } else {
    document.getElementById("myBtn").style.display = "none";
  }
}

// When the user clicks on the button, scroll to the top of the document
function topFunction() {
  document.body.scrollTop = 0;
  document.documentElement.scrollTop = 0;
}
</script></div><div id="tncms-block-615295" class="tncms-block padding-bottom padding-left padding-top"><section id="block-615295" class="block emphasis-h3   " ><div class="block"><a href="/" ><img

        __tnt.trackEvent = function(obj) {
            if( jQuery.type(obj) === 'object' ){
                 
                    if(obj.category && obj.action){
                        __tnt.googleEvent(obj);
                    } else if(obj.network && obj.socialAction){
                        __tnt.googleSocial(obj);
                    } else if(obj.url){
                        __tnt.googlePageView(obj);
                    }
                    if(typeof TNCMS.Tracking != 'undefined' && obj.metric){
                        TNCMS.Tracking.addEvent({
                            app: obj.app,
                            metric: obj.metric,
                            id: obj.uuid
                        });
                    }
                
            }
        }

            jQuery(__tnt.trackEventLater).each(function(){
                __tnt.trackEvent($(this));
            });
        }

<script>/*<![CDATA[*/ 
                __tnt.googleEvent = function(obj) {
                    dataLayer.push({
                        'event': 'tncms.event.trigger',
                             'tncms.event.trigger.category': obj.category,
                             'tncms.event.trigger.action': obj.action,
                             'tncms.event.trigger.label': obj.label, 
                             'tncms.event.trigger.value': obj.value
                    });
                }
                /* Virtual page view */
                __tnt.googlePageView = function(obj) {
                    var sURL = obj.url.replace(/^.*\/\/[^\/]+/, '');
                    dataLayer.push({
                        'event': 'tncms.event.virtual_pageview',
                            'tncms.event.virtual_pageview.url': sURL,
                            'tncms.event.virtual_pageview.title': obj.title
                    });
                }
                /* Social event */
                __tnt.googleSocial = function(obj) {
                    dataLayer.push({
                        'event': 'tncms.event.social',
                            'tncms.event.social.network': obj.network,
                            'tncms.event.social.action': obj.socialAction,
                            'tncms.event.social.target': obj.url
                    });
                } /*]]>*/</script>

            $(function(){
                var bloxServiceIDs = [];
                var bloxUserServiceIds = [];
                var dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];

                
                bloxServiceIDs.push();
                

                if (__tnt.user.services){
                    var bloxUserServiceIDs = __tnt.user.services.replace('%2C',',').split(',');
                }

                // GTM tncms.subscription.paid_access_service_ids
                if(bloxServiceIDs){
                    dataLayer.push({'tncms':{'subscription':{'access_service_ids':bloxServiceIDs.toString()}}});
                }

                // GTM tncms.subscrption.user_service_ids
                if(bloxUserServiceIDs){
                    dataLayer.push({'tncms':{'subscription':{'user_service_ids':bloxUserServiceIDs.toString()}}});
                }
            });

<script>
    $('#site-search-615297-btn').on(__tnt.client.clickEvent, function(){
        $('#site-search-615297').submit();
        return false;
    });

    $('#site-search-615297').on('submit', function(){
        // Filter query
        var sQueryFiltered = $("#site-search-615297 input[name=q]").val().replace(/\?/g, '');
    $("#site-search-615297 input[name=q]").val( sQueryFiltered );

        if( $('#site-search-615297-term').val() ){
            return true;
        }else{
            return false;
        }
    });</script></div></div>

                <script>
                    jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                        var sNavContainer = '#site-navbar-container';
                        var sBodyContainer = '#main-body-container';
                        var sNavHeight = $(sNavContainer).height();
                        var iUnfixPoint = 0;
                        if( __tnt.client.platform.ios ){
                            $(sNavContainer).addClass('affix-sticky');
                        } else {
                            $sNavScroll = false;
                            $(window).on('scroll mousewheel', function(){
                                if( !$sNavScroll ){
                                    $sNavScroll = true;
                                    setTimeout(function(){
                                        var iFixPoint = $(sNavContainer).offset().top;
                                        var iCurrPoint = $(this).scrollTop();
                                        if( iCurrPoint >= iFixPoint && iCurrPoint > iUnfixPoint ){
                                            if( !$(sNavContainer).hasClass('affix') ){ 
                                                iUnfixPoint = iFixPoint;
                                                $(sNavContainer).addClass('affix').removeClass('affix-top');
                                                $(sBodyContainer).css('margin-top', sNavHeight+'px'); 
                                            }
                                        } else {
                                            if( !$(sNavContainer).hasClass('affix-top') ){ 
                                                $(sNavContainer).removeClass('affix').addClass('affix-top');
                                                $(sBodyContainer).css('margin-top', 0);
                                            }
                                        }
                                        $sNavScroll = false;
                                    }, 25);
                                }
                            });
                        }
                    });
                </script>

                            </p>
                        
                        <p>Email notifications are only sent once a day, and only if there are new matching items.</p>
                        <form id="followed-notification-modal-form" class="follow-notify-form" action="/search/savedsearch/save/?f=html&amp;q=labour&amp;d1=2018-01-01&amp;d2=2019-01-01&amp;sd=desc&amp;l=100&amp;t=article&amp;nsa=eedition&amp;app%5B0%5D=editorial&amp;o=100" method="post">
                            <input class="input-notification-name" type="hidden" name="title" value="Labour search notification">
                            <div class="row">
                                <div class="col-sm-6">
                                    <button class="btn btn-success btn-block follow-btn" >
                                        <i class="fas tnt-spinner tnt-pulse" style="display:none;"></i> Save
                                    </button>
                                </div>
                                <div class="col-sm-6">
                                    <a class="btn btn-default btn-block" href="https://www.trinidadexpress.com/users/admin/savedsearch/">Manage followed notifications</a>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </form>
                        <script>
                            jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                                $('#followed-notification-modal-form').submit(function(e) {
                                    e.preventDefault();
                                    var $followBtn = $(this).find('.follow-btn');
                                    var sAction = $(this).attr('action') + '&title=' + $(this).find('.input-notification-name').val();
                                    $followBtn.find('.tnt-svg').show();
                                    $followBtn.prop('disabled', true);

                                    function submit_finished($alert){
                                        setTimeout(function(){
                                            $followBtn.find('.tnt-svg').hide();
                                            $alert.show().delay(2500).fadeOut(400);
                                        },2000);
                                    }

                                    $.ajax({
                                        type: 'POST',
                                        url: sAction,
                                        data: $(this).serialize(),
                                        success: function(oData){
                                            
                                            submit_finished( $('#followed-notification-modal-user .alert-success') );
                                        },
                                        error: function(oData){
                                            submit_finished( $('#followed-notification-modal-user .alert-danger') );
                                        }
                                    });
                                });
                            });
                        </script>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        $(function(){
            /* handle automatic form expand */
            $('#search-form-text').focus(function(){
                $('#search-form-collapse').collapse('show');
                $('#search-form-collapse-toggle').toggleClass('collapsed');
            });

            $('#search-form-collapse').on('show.bs.collapse', function(){
                $('#search-form-collapse-toggle .advanced-text').addClass('hide');
                $('#search-form-collapse-toggle .close-text').removeClass('hide');
            });

            $('#search-form-collapse').on('hide.bs.collapse', function(){
                $('#search-form-collapse-toggle .advanced-text').removeClass('hide');
                $('#search-form-collapse-toggle .close-text').addClass('hide');
            });

            $('#input-type-all').change(function(){
                if(this.checked){
                    $('#input-type-articles,#input-type-collections,#input-type-videos,#input-type-images,#input-type-documents').prop('checked',false);
                }
            });
            $('#input-type-articles,#input-type-collections,#input-type-videos,#input-type-images,#input-type-documents').change(function(){
                if( $('#input-type-all')[0].checked ){
                    $('#input-type-all').prop('checked',false);
                }
            });
            $('.input-section-all').change(function(){
                if(this.checked){
                    $('.input-section').prop('checked',false);
                }
            });
            $('.input-section').change(function(){
                if( $('.input-section-all')[0].checked ){
                    $('.input-section-all').prop('checked',false);
                }
            });

            $('#input-d1, #input-d2').datepicker({
                startDate: '-100y',
                format: 'yyyy-mm-dd',
                todayHighlight: true,
                autoclose: 'true'
            }).on('show hide', function(e){
                e.stopPropagation();
            });

            $('#search-form').find('.search-submit').on(__tnt.client.clickEvent, function(){
                $('#search-form').submit();
            });
            

            $('#search-form').on('submit', function(){
                // Filter query
                var sQueryFiltered = $("#search-form input[name=q]").val().replace(/\?/g, '');
    $("#search-form input[name=q]").val( sQueryFiltered );
                
                // Define type and section values
                var sTypeVals = $.map($('.input-type:checked'), function(n, i){
                    return n.value;
                }).join(',');
                var sTypeValsSection = $.map($('.input-section:checked'), function(n, i){
                    return n.value;
                }).join(',');
                $('#input-t').val(sTypeVals);
                $('#input-c').val(sTypeValsSection);
                // Scrub empty inputs
                $(this).find(':input').each(function(){
                    if ($(this).val() == '') $(this).attr("disabled", "disabled");
                });
                // Sort by relevance patch
                $(this).find('#select-s option:selected')
                    .filter(function() {
                        return !this.value || $.trim(this.value).length == 0;
                    })
                    .parent()
                    .attr("disabled", "disabled");
                $('#search-form').find('.search-submit').find('[data-fa-i2svg]').replaceWith('<i class="fas tnt-spinner tnt-spin"></i>');
            });
        });
    </script>

            <div class="card-container"><div class="card-image ">
                        <div class="media-preview-ed2b5f4e-d07e-11e8-977b-8b27cb11b72e media-preview article-asset" data-aspect=""><figure class="photo layout-horizontal">

            <div class="card-container">
                
                <div class="card-body"><div class="card-labels">
            
                <div class="card-label-section text-muted">
                    <a href="/opinion/letters/" class="tnt-section-tag">Letters to Editor</a>
                </div>
            
            
        </div><div class="card-headline"><h3 class="tnt-headline ">
        
             <a href="/opinion/letters/team-red-ready-for-victory/article_f99e28aa-c2b5-11e8-8428-7f0eef63a775.html" class="tnt-asset-link">
        

        
            Team RED ready for victory</a></h3></div><div class="card-meta">
            <ul class="list-inline">
                        <li class="card-byline text-muted"><span  class="tnt-byline">Vishnu Bisram
North American Caribbean Teachers Association</span></li><li class="card-date">
        <time datetime="2018-09-27T20:45:00-04:00" class="tnt-date asset-date text-muted">Sep 27, 2018</time></li><li class="card-comment-count"></li></ul>
        </div>
                    
                    
                    
                    
                        
                        
                            <div class="card-lead">

                <div id="tncms-region-footer-top-col-full" class="tncms-region "><div id="tncms-block-726251" class="tncms-block"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
<style>
html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}
body {

}

#myBtn {
  display: none;
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 20px;
  right: 30px;
  z-index: 99;
  font-size: 18px;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  background-color: red;
  color: white;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 15px;
  border-radius: 4px;
}

#myBtn:hover {
  background-color: #555;
}
</style>
<button onclick="topFunction()" id="myBtn" title="Go to top">Top</button><script>
// When the user scrolls down 20px from the top of the document, show the button
window.onscroll = function() {scrollFunction()};

function scrollFunction() {
  if (document.body.scrollTop > 20 || document.documentElement.scrollTop > 20) {
    document.getElementById("myBtn").style.display = "block";
  } else {
    document.getElementById("myBtn").style.display = "none";
  }
}

// When the user clicks on the button, scroll to the top of the document
function topFunction() {
  document.body.scrollTop = 0;
  document.documentElement.scrollTop = 0;
}
</script></div><div id="tncms-block-615295" class="tncms-block padding-bottom padding-left padding-top"><section id="block-615295" class="block emphasis-h3   " ><div class="block"><a href="/" ><img

__tnt.compatibility.status = "";
__tnt.compatibility.check = function(){
    var compatible = true;
    var status = "";

    if(typeof(__tnt.advertisements)=="undefined"){
        compatible = false;
        status += "FAIL: object 0 undefined "
    }

    __tnt.compatibility.status = status;
    return compatible;
}

}

<script>
        __tnt.trackEvent = function(obj) {
            if( jQuery.type(obj) === 'object' ){
                 
                    if(obj.category && obj.action){
                        __tnt.googleEvent(obj);
                    } else if(obj.network && obj.socialAction){
                        __tnt.googleSocial(obj);
                    } else if(obj.url){
                        __tnt.googlePageView(obj);
                    }
                    if(typeof TNCMS.Tracking != 'undefined' && obj.metric){
                        TNCMS.Tracking.addEvent({
                            app: obj.app,
                            metric: obj.metric,
                            id: obj.uuid
                        });
                    }
                
            }
        }
        
        if(__tnt.trackEventLater.length > 0){
            jQuery(__tnt.trackEventLater).each(function(){
                __tnt.trackEvent($(this));
            });
        }
        jQuery('body').on(__tnt.client.clickEvent, '[data-track]', function(){
            var trkObj = jQuery(this).data('track');
            __tnt.trackEvent(trkObj);
        });
        jQuery('body').on(__tnt.client.clickEvent, '[data-tncms-track-event]', function(){
            var trkObj = jQuery(this).data('tncms-track-event');
            __tnt.trackEvent(trkObj);
        });
        jQuery('body').on(__tnt.client.clickEvent, '[data-tncms-track-dmp]', function(){
            var dmpData = jQuery(this).data('tncms-track-dmp');
            });
    </script>
    
<script>/*<![CDATA[*/ 
                __tnt.googleEvent = function(obj) {
                    dataLayer.push({
                        'event': 'tncms.event.trigger',
                             'tncms.event.trigger.category': obj.category,
                             'tncms.event.trigger.action': obj.action,
                             'tncms.event.trigger.label': obj.label, 
                             'tncms.event.trigger.value': obj.value
                    });
                }
                /* Virtual page view */
                __tnt.googlePageView = function(obj) {
                    var sURL = obj.url.replace(/^.*\/\/[^\/]+/, '');
                    dataLayer.push({
                        'event': 'tncms.event.virtual_pageview',
                            'tncms.event.virtual_pageview.url': sURL,
                            'tncms.event.virtual_pageview.title': obj.title
                    });
                }
                /* Social event */
                __tnt.googleSocial = function(obj) {
                    dataLayer.push({
                        'event': 'tncms.event.social',
                            'tncms.event.social.network': obj.network,
                            'tncms.event.social.action': obj.socialAction,
                            'tncms.event.social.target': obj.url
                    });
                } /*]]>*/</script>

            $(function(){
                var bloxServiceIDs = [];
                var bloxUserServiceIds = [];
                var dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];

                
                bloxServiceIDs.push();
                

                if (__tnt.user.services){
                    var bloxUserServiceIDs = __tnt.user.services.replace('%2C',',').split(',');
                }

                // GTM tncms.subscription.paid_access_service_ids

                    dataLayer.push({'tncms':{'subscription':{'user_service_ids':bloxUserServiceIDs.toString()}}});
                }

<script>
    $('#site-search-615297-btn').on(__tnt.client.clickEvent, function(){
        $('#site-search-615297').submit();
        return false;
    });

    $('#site-search-615297').on('submit', function(){
        // Filter query
        var sQueryFiltered = $("#site-search-615297 input[name=q]").val().replace(/\?/g, '');
    $("#site-search-615297 input[name=q]").val( sQueryFiltered );

        if( $('#site-search-615297-term').val() ){
            return true;
        }else{
            return false;
        }
    });</script></div></div>

                <script>
                    jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                        var sNavContainer = '#site-navbar-container';
                        var sBodyContainer = '#main-body-container';
                        var sNavHeight = $(sNavContainer).height();
                        var iUnfixPoint = 0;
                        if( __tnt.client.platform.ios ){
                            $(sNavContainer).addClass('affix-sticky');
                        } else {
                            $sNavScroll = false;
                            $(window).on('scroll mousewheel', function(){
                                if( !$sNavScroll ){
                                    $sNavScroll = true;
                                    setTimeout(function(){
                                        var iFixPoint = $(sNavContainer).offset().top;
                                        var iCurrPoint = $(this).scrollTop();
                                        if( iCurrPoint >= iFixPoint && iCurrPoint > iUnfixPoint ){
                                            if( !$(sNavContainer).hasClass('affix') ){ 
                                                iUnfixPoint = iFixPoint;
                                                $(sNavContainer).addClass('affix').removeClass('affix-top');
                                                $(sBodyContainer).css('margin-top', sNavHeight+'px'); 
                                            }
                                        } else {
                                            if( !$(sNavContainer).hasClass('affix-top') ){ 
                                                $(sNavContainer).removeClass('affix').addClass('affix-top');
                                                $(sBodyContainer).css('margin-top', 0);
                                            }
                                        }
                                        $sNavScroll = false;
                                    }, 25);
                                }
                            });
                        }
                    });
                </script>

                        <form id="followed-notification-modal-form" class="follow-notify-form" action="/search/savedsearch/save/?f=html&amp;q=labour&amp;d1=2018-01-01&amp;d2=2019-01-01&amp;sd=desc&amp;l=100&amp;t=article&amp;nsa=eedition&amp;app%5B0%5D=editorial&amp;o=200" method="post">

                        <script>
                            jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                                $('#followed-notification-modal-form').submit(function(e) {
                                    e.preventDefault();
                                    var $followBtn = $(this).find('.follow-btn');
                                    var sAction = $(this).attr('action') + '&title=' + $(this).find('.input-notification-name').val();
                                    $followBtn.find('.tnt-svg').show();
                                    $followBtn.prop('disabled', true);

                                    function submit_finished($alert){
                                        setTimeout(function(){
                                            $followBtn.find('.tnt-svg').hide();
                                            $alert.show().delay(2500).fadeOut(400);
                                        },2000);
                                    }

                                    $.ajax({
                                        type: 'POST',
                                        url: sAction,
                                        data: $(this).serialize(),
                                        success: function(oData){
                                            
                                            submit_finished( $('#followed-notification-modal-user .alert-success') );
                                        },
                                        error: function(oData){
                                            submit_finished( $('#followed-notification-modal-user .alert-danger') );
                                        }
                                    });
                                });
                            });
                        </script>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

    <script>
        $(function(){
            /* handle automatic form expand */
            $('#search-form-text').focus(function(){
                $('#search-form-collapse').collapse('show');
                $('#search-form-collapse-toggle').toggleClass('collapsed');
            });

            $('#search-form-collapse').on('show.bs.collapse', function(){
                $('#search-form-collapse-toggle .advanced-text').addClass('hide');
                $('#search-form-collapse-toggle .close-text').removeClass('hide');
            });

            $('#search-form-collapse').on('hide.bs.collapse', function(){
                $('#search-form-collapse-toggle .advanced-text').removeClass('hide');
                $('#search-form-collapse-toggle .close-text').addClass('hide');
            });

            $('#input-type-all').change(function(){
                if(this.checked){
                    $('#input-type-articles,#input-type-collections,#input-type-videos,#input-type-images,#input-type-documents').prop('checked',false);
                }
            });
            $('#input-type-articles,#input-type-collections,#input-type-videos,#input-type-images,#input-type-documents').change(function(){
                if( $('#input-type-all')[0].checked ){
                    $('#input-type-all').prop('checked',false);
                }
            });
            $('.input-section-all').change(function(){
                if(this.checked){
                    $('.input-section').prop('checked',false);
                }
            });
            $('.input-section').change(function(){
                if( $('.input-section-all')[0].checked ){
                    $('.input-section-all').prop('checked',false);
                }
            });

            $('#input-d1, #input-d2').datepicker({
                startDate: '-100y',
                format: 'yyyy-mm-dd',
                todayHighlight: true,
                autoclose: 'true'
            }).on('show hide', function(e){
                e.stopPropagation();
            });

            $('#search-form').find('.search-submit').on(__tnt.client.clickEvent, function(){
                $('#search-form').submit();
            });
            

            $('#search-form').on('submit', function(){
                // Filter query
                var sQueryFiltered = $("#search-form input[name=q]").val().replace(/\?/g, '');
    $("#search-form input[name=q]").val( sQueryFiltered );
                
                // Define type and section values
                var sTypeVals = $.map($('.input-type:checked'), function(n, i){
                    return n.value;
                }).join(',');
                var sTypeValsSection = $.map($('.input-section:checked'), function(n, i){
                    return n.value;
                }).join(',');
                $('#input-t').val(sTypeVals);
                $('#input-c').val(sTypeValsSection);
                // Scrub empty inputs
                $(this).find(':input').each(function(){
                    if ($(this).val() == '') $(this).attr("disabled", "disabled");
                });
                // Sort by relevance patch
                $(this).find('#select-s option:selected')
                    .filter(function() {
                        return !this.value || $.trim(this.value).length == 0;
                    })
                    .parent()
                    .attr("disabled", "disabled");
                $('#search-form').find('.search-submit').find('[data-fa-i2svg]').replaceWith('<i class="fas tnt-spinner tnt-spin"></i>');
            });
        });
    </script>

                <div class="card-label-section text-muted">
                    <a href="/opinion/editorials/" class="tnt-section-tag">Editorial</a>
                </div>
            
            
        </div><div class="card-headline"><h3 class="tnt-headline ">
        
             <a href="/opinion/editorials/putting-an-end-to-sexual-harassment/article_43698c76-2410-11e8-bff0-73c830c43a02.html" class="tnt-asset-link">
        

        
            Putting an end to  sexual harassment</a></h3></div><div class="card-meta">
            <ul class="list-inline"><li class="card-date">
        <time datetime="2018-03-09T23:08:00-04:00" class="tnt-date asset-date text-muted">Mar 9, 2018</time></li><li class="card-comment-count"></li></ul>
        </div>
                    
                    
                    
                    
                        
                        
                            <div class="card-lead">
                                <p class="tnt-summary"><p>SEXUAL harassment in the workplace may appear to be the latest hot button topic but it is in fact a long-standing evil that has been allowed to continue without the necessary rules to prevent it, or hard and fast means to take action against the perpetrators.</p></p>
                            </div>
                        
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>

<style>
html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}
body {

}

#myBtn {
  display: none;
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 20px;
  right: 30px;
  z-index: 99;
  font-size: 18px;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  background-color: red;
  color: white;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 15px;
  border-radius: 4px;
}

#myBtn:hover {
  background-color: #555;
}
</style>
<button onclick="topFunction()" id="myBtn" title="Go to top">Top</button><script>
// When the user scrolls down 20px from the top of the document, show the button
window.onscroll = function() {scrollFunction()};

function scrollFunction() {
  if (document.body.scrollTop > 20 || document.documentElement.scrollTop > 20) {
    document.getElementById("myBtn").style.display = "block";
  } else {
    document.getElementById("myBtn").style.display = "none";
  }
}

// When the user clicks on the button, scroll to the top of the document
function topFunction() {
  document.body.scrollTop = 0;
  document.documentElement.scrollTop = 0;
}
</script></div><div id="tncms-block-615295" class="tncms-block padding-bottom padding-left padding-top"><section id="block-615295" class="block emphasis-h3   " ><div class="block"><a href="/" ><img

__tnt.compatibility || (__tnt.compatibility = {});

__tnt.compatibility.status = "";
__tnt.compatibility.check = function(){
    var compatible = true;
    var status = "";

    if(typeof(__tnt.advertisements)=="undefined"){
        compatible = false;
        status += "FAIL: object 0 undefined "
    }

    __tnt.compatibility.status = status;
    return compatible;
}
__tnt.compatibility.notification = function(){
}

        if(window.ga){

<script>
        __tnt.trackEvent = function(obj) {
            if( jQuery.type(obj) === 'object' ){
                 
                    if(obj.category && obj.action){
                        __tnt.googleEvent(obj);
                    } else if(obj.network && obj.socialAction){
                        __tnt.googleSocial(obj);
                    } else if(obj.url){
                        __tnt.googlePageView(obj);
                    }
                    if(typeof TNCMS.Tracking != 'undefined' && obj.metric){
                        TNCMS.Tracking.addEvent({
                            app: obj.app,
                            metric: obj.metric,
                            id: obj.uuid
                        });
                    }
                
            }
        }
        
        if(__tnt.trackEventLater.length > 0){
            jQuery(__tnt.trackEventLater).each(function(){
                __tnt.trackEvent($(this));
            });
        }
        jQuery('body').on(__tnt.client.clickEvent, '[data-track]', function(){
            var trkObj = jQuery(this).data('track');
            __tnt.trackEvent(trkObj);
        });
        jQuery('body').on(__tnt.client.clickEvent, '[data-tncms-track-event]', function(){
            var trkObj = jQuery(this).data('tncms-track-event');
            __tnt.trackEvent(trkObj);
        });
        jQuery('body').on(__tnt.client.clickEvent, '[data-tncms-track-dmp]', function(){
            var dmpData = jQuery(this).data('tncms-track-dmp');
            });
    </script>
    
<script>/*<![CDATA[*/ 
                __tnt.googleEvent = function(obj) {
                    dataLayer.push({
                        'event': 'tncms.event.trigger',
                             'tncms.event.trigger.category': obj.category,
                             'tncms.event.trigger.action': obj.action,
                             'tncms.event.trigger.label': obj.label, 
                             'tncms.event.trigger.value': obj.value
                    });
                }
                /* Virtual page view */
                __tnt.googlePageView = function(obj) {
                    var sURL = obj.url.replace(/^.*\/\/[^\/]+/, '');
                    dataLayer.push({
                        'event': 'tncms.event.virtual_pageview',
                            'tncms.event.virtual_pageview.url': sURL,
                            'tncms.event.virtual_pageview.title': obj.title
                    });
                }
                /* Social event */
                __tnt.googleSocial = function(obj) {
                    dataLayer.push({
                        'event': 'tncms.event.social',
                            'tncms.event.social.network': obj.network,
                            'tncms.event.social.action': obj.socialAction,
                            'tncms.event.social.target': obj.url
                    });
                } /*]]>*/</script>

            avatar_615302.append('<i class="fas tnt-user tnt-fw user-icon"></i>');
